backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor handling user profiles, storage, authorization, and friend request logic with permission checks.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration function that converts old user profiles to the new profile format by removing deprecated fields.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records showing which frontend files implement flag‑removal features and their associated metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend components, hooks, and utilities used throughout the app.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based theme variables and styles for both light and dark modes using warm color palettes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the Tchat application via the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component managing authentication flow, dialogs, layout, and routing between chat and profile features.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button component handling login/logout with Internet Identity and React Query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/chat/InviteToRoo: Dialog for inviting friends to chat rooms, showing user profiles, fallbacks, and handling invite actions with loading states.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageComp: Text and image message composer with validation, preview, upload tracking, and submit handling for a chat room.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageThre: Displays a scrollable chat thread with message bubbles, profile lookups, error/loading states, and an invite dialog.
frontend/src/components/chat/RoomList.ts: Lists chat rooms with loading/error states and includes a form for creating and selecting rooms.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendsD: Dialog for viewing friends, searching users, and sending friend requests with profile and loading states.
frontend/src/components/profile/FlagBadg: Empty placeholder file for a profile flag badge component.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileE: Profile editing dialog allowing name, bio, avatar color, and image upload with preview and validation.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileN: Simple component that renders a user's display name.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Initial profile setup dialog for creating a basic user profile with name and bio.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserAvat: Renders a user avatar using a profile picture when available or falls back to an initial-based colored avatar with size variants.
frontend/src/components/settings/Setting: Provides a dialog for updating theme and message polling interval, applying changes and persisting them via callbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useChatRooms.ts: Exposes hooks to list chat rooms and create new rooms, updating cached room data on mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useFriends.ts: Defines hooks for searching users, fetching friends, and handling friend request actions with cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements context and utilities for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth client lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoomMembers.ts: Provides a mutation hook to add a user to a room and invalidates room data afterward.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoomMessages.ts: Fetches room messages with optional polling and posts new messages, invalidating affected message queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hooks for retrieving and saving user profiles, updating related cached profile data on changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind setup defining light and dark theme color variables and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, query client, identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash routing) and persisting them in sessionStorage, plus utilities to clear them.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS themes, colors, fonts, plugins, animations, and container settings for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, features, issues, and architectural notes for the chat application.
